attributes.action: Sign a defensive pact with Sweden to keep them safe
attributes.additional_details: We have already seen Russian aggression with the idea of countries trying to join NATO, so we should try and keep Sweden safe.
attributes.background: Make it so if Sweden is attacked it counts as us being attacked which would allow us to call on NATO. It would be a major deterrent.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when an armed attack is considered an attack against NATO is a matter for NATO, and cannot be changed by a member state entering a separate agreement with a non member state.

The UK and Sweden have already agreed a Political Declaration of Solidarity, to confirm their shared desire for closer, stronger defence and security cooperation, and to reinforce their key strategic partnership: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/united-kingdom-sweden-statement-11-may-2022/united-kingdom-sweden-statement

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to seek a new defensive agreement with Sweden, but this would not affect how NATO operates.
